title: Regulation (EEC) No 3424/75 of the Council of 18 December 1975 on the application of Decisions 1/75 and 2/75 of the EEC-Portugal Joint Committee concerning the methods of administrative cooperation
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 3423/75 OF THE COUNCIL  of 18 December 1975  on the application of Decisions 1/75 and 2/75 of the EEC-Norway Joint Committee concerning the methods of administrative cooperation
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the purpose of applying the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Kingdom of Norway, Decisions 1/75 and 2/75 of the Joint Committee annexed hereto shall apply within the Community.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1976.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1975.
For the Council
The President
M. TOROS  (1)OJ No L 171, 17.6.1973, p. 2.
